markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 321 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deity**
[Black Butterfly](/Deities.aspx?ID=115)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

The target's form appears blurry. It becomes [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4). As the nature of this effect still leaves the target's location obvious, the target can't use this concealment to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) or [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63).
name: Blur

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 321 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deity**
[Black Butterfly](/Deities.aspx?ID=115)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

---

<summary>
Cause a target's form to become blurry and hard to hit.
</summary>
summary: Cause a target's form to become blurry and hard to hit.
summary_markdown: Cause a target's form to become blurry and hard to hit.
text: Blur Source Core Rulebook pg. 321 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deity Black Butterfly Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 creature Duration 1 minute --- The target's form appears blurry. It becomes concealed. As the nature of this effect still leaves the target's location obvious, the target can't use this concealment to Hide or Sneak.
